name: ImportModelStoreAX2012
friendlyName: Import a Model store into AX 2012
description: Does Import a Model store into an AX 2012 Environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: modelstoreFileName
inputs.label: Model store file path (.axmodelstore)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the ax model store file.

inputs.name: schemaName
inputs.label: Schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the schema. If empty, default schema is used and the schema will be applied directly. (optional)

inputs.name: initSchema
inputs.label: Initialize schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the schema be initialised. (Ignored if schema name is not set)

inputs.name: applySchema
inputs.label: Apply schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the schema be applied directly. (Ignored if schema name is not set)

inputs.name: ignoreIdConflict
inputs.label: Ignore id conflicts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should id conflicts during the import be ignored?

inputs.name: backupSchemaName
inputs.label: Backup schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the backup schema. (optional)

inputs.name: showModelStoreDetails
inputs.label: Show model store details
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the model store details be shown?

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - Import a Model store into AX2012: $(modelstoreFileName)
